Summary: Black triangle sailed overhead, no sound heard,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Olema
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was camping at an olema recreation\park camp area just talking with a buddy, and my other friend spotted the flying object first and brought it to my attention. we watched it sail past us, hard to estimate altitude and size because it was at night. for some reason, i did not get excited, it seemed to cruise by, not in a hurry, or evasive or anything. i had a feeling that it was one of 'ours'. it seemed to have a constant-intensity white light at each of the three corners and a white\blue light on the objects' underside, right in the center. it was viewable for about 10-15 seconds as it crossed the sky in a straight line before i lost sight of it at the tree-line horizon, i estimate it was traveling in a nw to se direction.
